Did:

  • chart-system - review [G2M] added ratio adjuster #139
  • react-maps - add all env var to chromatic file and in the repo in github #85
  • react-maps/locus-map - add default geometryAccesor & story for Locus map #82

  • overlord - test master branch and make new release v3.7.0
  • atom- prepare release notes and make release announcement
  • react-maps - add AuthMapWrapper component for Login #85
  • react-maps - add login process to stories that need it #85
  • react-maps - rewrite stories in new Storybook syntax #85
  • react-maps - clean up and reorganize functions in files #85
  • overlord - test deploy and merge [G2M] Report/GeoCohortChart - aggregate data in table by GeoCohortList #1848
  • tech-connect - prepare
  • tech-connect - prepare for dry run
  • overlord - [G2M] Report/GeoCohortChart - aggregate data in table by GeoCohortList #1848

  • overlord - update poi-manage package to v1.0.5; test deployed branch #1803
  • react-maps/locus-map - make a list and decide with the team which features should be added to locus-map as minimum requirements to replace Kepler map (https://www.notion.so/eqproduct/7a8c9959b64d45bd8117bce26ae27a01?v=f894dbd4b22f4b16a38a54f567f9daee)
  • poi-manage - change typography elements/styling in POICard so we don't have clashes with styles set in overlord or snoke and update in overlord branch #1803
  • common-login - research how to use for react-maps stories
  • overlord - update react-maps; test deploy of #1803
  • tech-connect - prepare for demo


Doing:

  • react-maps/locus-map - add custom cursor prop, setup pickable for each layer #82
  • ql-ui/widget-studio - review Controller elements for final map widget that agree with Locus Map roadmap
  • react-maps - investigate login comp issues with key_warden configs #85

  • snoke/conn-hub - config bug

  • snoke/conn-hub - met with design team and discussed design issues

  • snoke/conn-hub - multiple connections per set - better usage flow

  • POI page tab

Selin
Did:

  • lumen-labs - button component refactor + update new colours
  • ql/re-layout - connect modal tree selector to qlModel
  • lumen-tree - update with new colours + component refactor + release v0.1.0-alpha.8
  • ql/re-layout - arrange views/query/results sections with Layout
  • ql/re-layout - setup browse-all-views modal
  • ql/re-layout - manage browse-all-views modal onClose states + header & footer buttons
  • lumen-labs - update colour palette
  • lumen-labs/colour - discuss & finalize colour theme with Catherine
  • lumen-labs/accordion - fix arbitrary colour inheritance
  • lumen-labs/colour - replace current colour classes with new colour theme
  • lumen-labs/accordion - expose css-in-js handler with Goober
  • lumen-labs - update new shadows
  • lumen-labs/chips - add chips base components (passed to KC)
  • lumem-labs - publish + test use in QL
  • lumen-labs - enable css-in-js using Goober


Doing:

  • ql/re-layout - remove nesting of tabs & drawers
  • lumen-labs - add list base + styled components
  • ql/re-layout - all views list layout + connect list to qlModel
  • ql/re-layout - all views selectable columns component



Leo
Did:

  • locussdk/devops - apply single-source versioning for locussdk.__version__
  • locussdk/devops - fix pipenv related actions/cache issue
  • hr - workable email correspondence and answer questions
  • locussdk/devops - github actions to enforce version release (like package.json checking) between locussdk.__version__ and tagged version
  • common/communication - revise with updates (migrate into notion)
  • locussdk/aoi - use new /dataset/aoi/cost endpoint for usage cost, phase out deprecated API side changes (such as removal of query.token)
  • locussdk/dataset - general cleanup of deprecated query.token
  • firstorder/dataset - refactor out AOI subpackage, deprecate /eq/aoi routes to /aoi and deprecate query.report_id to query.report for better end-to-end consistency
  • firstorder/dataset - centralize cost computation (for instance AOI)
  • firstorder/dataset - revise /geo series with generic geojson endpoint
  • locussdk/geo - create_geocohort() (draft created)
  • smaug/devops - automate deployment, add due main branch lint workflow
  • product intern - review ws https://github.com/EQWorks/ws-problems/issues/201
  • snoke/builder - elevate Geo Cohort to the same level as Segments, and force enable AOI when selected
  • firstorder/builder - compat phasing from /requests to /builder endpoints
  • locussdk/enrichment - revision based on review https://github.com/EQWorks/locussdk/pull/106#pullrequestreview-705238323
  • snoke/hub - gcs connector new recommend Storage Object Viewer role for service account access
  • data - day 1 onboarding Maggie Ma
  • locussdk/enrichment - restructure enrich_device and enrich under enrichment sub-package
  • locussdk/enrichment - remove all modules hard dep on Pandas
  • locus/hub - pricing connection check
  • locussdk/dataset - revise io and AOI related arguments
  • locussdk/ql - remove hard dep on Pandas
  • locussdk/poi - remove hard dep on Pandas
  • locussdk/utils - refactor and remove hard dep on Pandas
  • locussd/geo - split out from utils
  • locussdk/geo - remove hard dep on Pandas


Doing:

  • locussdk - groom through and work on open-sourcing, with pypi distribtion
  • builder - adapt popular times segments type with necessary changes
  • nn-viz - input visualizations
  • nn-viz - classification/regression visualizations
  • update/nlp - run baseline training corpus (prs/issues/dids/doings) against doc2vec/word2vec/lda models and compare performance, design shifting training window process
  • updates/nlp - incorporate with fasttext.js and dedupe actual runs
  • ws-problems/product - create sample solution for the backend track



Sally
Did:

  • design - update modal with new design tokens and button styles (figma only - zeplin update will come after input box and selector components are redesigned)
  • design - update button components by new colour rules, create its official design guide
  • design - map out cases, variants and required attributes for each type of selector and dropdown components
  • lumen-labs - added templates for making new design-update issues
  • design/locus-ql - update ql workbook with new colour scheme
  • design/locus-ql - determine cases for displaying query progress and implement design accordingly
  • design/connection-hub - UX audit, identify main pain points / and initial discussions
  • design - colour scheme and surface colours implementation strategy discussion
  • design/lumen-labs - refractor chip component documentation and add as issue on lumen labs
  • design - review and redesign shadow levels based on new primary and secondary colours (deployed to zeplin)
  • design/lumen-labs - test new design update process by opening github issues tagged with the 'design' label


Doing:

  • design/locus-ql - update ql user flow diagram to include new builder and query results features
  • design - test new progress bar, tooltip, code block components in usage, graduate to Figma components library and publish to Zeplin
  • design/locus-ql - design drag and drop animation for column and filter selection
  • design/connection-hub - create a user flow diagram for creating new connections
  • design/connection-hub - create a user flow diagram for modifying and managing existing connections
  • design/lumen-labs - redesign selector components
  • design/lumen-labs - redesign dropdown components
  • design/locus-ql - update ql user flow map to include new builder features
  • design - test new progress bar, tooltip, code block components in usage, graduate to Figma components library and publish to Zeplin
  • design/locus-ql - update entire ql workbook with new colour scheme, prep for demo
  • design/locus-ql - design drag and drop animation for column and filter selection
  • design/locus-ql - determine cases for displaying query progress and implement design accordingly
  • design - update modal with new design tokens and button style



Kyle
